title: The Ultimate Underdog? Eddie Dunbar Rebounds from Repeated Disappointments with Vuelta Stage Win
content:
‘I can’t believe it’: Perfectly-timed final kilometer surge ends run of bad luck for Dunbar and earns first WorldTour victory.

Read the full article at The Ultimate Underdog? Eddie Dunbar Rebounds from Repeated Disappointments with Vuelta Stage Win on Velo.
author: sstokes
